name: books
description: A Progressive Web App for reading and managing PDF books on Android devices with offline support.

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/pdfjs && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.min.js build/pdfjs/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.js build/pdfjs/
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
